scripts.package-win: tsc bin/main.ts && tsc bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.ts && ng build && node bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.js && electron-packager . ahenteti-httpclient --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=src/favicon.png --prune=true --out=release
scripts.package-mac: tsc bin/main.ts && tsc bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.ts && ng build && node bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.js && electron-packager . ahenteti-httpclient --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=src/favicon.png --prune=true --out=release
scripts.package-linux: tsc bin/main.ts && tsc bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.ts && ng build && node bin/update-base-tag-for-electron-app.js && electron-packager . ahenteti-httpclient --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=src/favicon.png --prune=true --out=release
